title: Exercise: Customize an FME Server App

questions.question: FME Server Apps are very customizable, however, what is one thing you cannot change about them?
FME Server Apps can be configured to not have the FME logo.
Why is the Geometry Parameter used?
options: So the user can select geometry to submit in the geometry picker.
So the user can submit data with geometry in it.
So the user can select the coordinate to use.
So the user can select a reprojection to use.
